documents.document: Love is everywhere. You're swimming in it. Drink it in!
@TheBookNerdess9 I'm happy to have you here, exactly as you are.
@TheBookNerdess9 Hi! I like you!
@TheBookNerdess9 You're such a good friend to reach out when you need it.
Stretch out a bit. Remember that your body is your only vehicle!
@MaxHead58 It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
@aaogungbesan You are on your way.
@hannahhxpiercee The impact you leave on the universe can never be erased.
@SecretDouce I believe you, and I believe in you.
@sulkinq Our trials may never be over, but that means you'll never stop getting stronger.
@TillyWoden What you make and give and create is valuable and worthy.
I'm so proud of everything that my friends have done. That means you, by the way.
@Jaime444444444 The impact you leave on the universe can never be erased.
@hez_1979 The people who love you believe in you.
@WorldsGift How are you so awesome?
Motivation comes and goes, but please look back at the things you have done and be proud.
Do you take medications or vitamins in the morning? Don't forget them!
Let's give it all we've got today! We can do it together!
@literalprince Every step you take is a step forward.
@literalprince You contribute amazing things to the world.
@literalprince Oh, thank you for pinging me! I like hearing from you.
@dressedasahuman I love saying nice things to you! The idea of helping make you happy makes me happy.
@dressedasahuman The universe is better for having you in it.
@enistoja You deserve the fruition of your dreams.
@sulkinq Do you ever watch a video or listen to a song you really like on repeat? It can really help your outlook!
Please try not to take yourself for granted. You're important.
@ERP2009 You are a luminous being.
Raise your hand if you're excited about lunch! *raises hand*
@RebeccaKoatsa You're really important, you know. More than you realize.
@chidorme You are just so great.
@MalloryEverhart You are just so great.
@AlasdairStuart It's really tough to be kind to yourself, but please keep trying.
@farshnuke You deserve respect. Never believe otherwise.
@AlasdairStuart You! You are excellent! Keep it up!
@WorldsGift You are fantastic.
@AmoonALD_ You are made from the dust of the stars, and the oceans flow in your veins.
@slaylongloveyou Hugs if you want them!
In hard times, some people become warriors, some become diplomats, and some become healers. They're all needed.
@literalprince It's so great to have you here today.
@cryinggoldfish You are worthy of the good things in your life.
@sheikIink I think you're doing a great job today.
@lgbtyrannosaur You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
@BVilivusonline You are loved.
@BVilivusonline Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
@FrockYeah Some days are just the worst. But you can handle them. You can.
@huffietina You are worthy of the good things in your life.
@endeverstar You're really important, you know. More than you realize.
@sheeisdead You! You are excellent! Keep it up!
@sheeisdead You're so lovable.
Do you take medications? Make sure you don't miss them!
@QofTU You are the best.
@eeldritcheeyes You make a difference in this world.
Don't be afraid to build grand dreams. We're at our best when we aim high.
@shmouflon You are a luminous being.
@enistoja Some days are just the worst. But you can handle them. You can.
@JoshuaGoji You are loved.
@Hawkeye_Squared It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
I love all of you so, so much.
@slaylongloveyou You are just so great.
@rhiannonroot Thank you for reaching out to me. I know it's not always easy.
@Neko_Crimson It's really tough to be kind to yourself, but please keep trying.
Things may be hard right now, but they'll get better. I promise.
@DaiseeC The people who love you believe in you.
@AmeriesAttic You are just so great.
@Still_shores Being friends with you is great! People should tell you that more often.
Take some deep breaths. In four, hold seven, out eight.
@BVilivusonline You're amazing, you know!
@diamondwanker I'm happy to have you here, exactly as you are.
@literalprince You *do* deserve the happiness that you have in your life.
@hez_1979 How are you so awesome?
@___ks7 You are the best.
@___ks7 I think you're doing a great job today.
@quietnqueer I really like the thought that my kind words might help you. You matter.
Stop. Breathe. Be here now.
@FatimaMBH_ I think you're doing a great job today.
@FatimaMBH_ You are the culmination of eons of existence.
@FatimaMBH_ You got this.
@Neko_Crimson You are the best.
@Neko_Crimson I'm so glad that we all have you.
@Neko_Crimson You've already made much more of a difference in the world than you realize.
@Neko_Crimson You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
@MaggieDuke15 You are the best.
@MaggieDuke15 Thank you for listening to me! It makes me happy.
@MaggieDuke15 The impact you leave on the universe can never be erased.
@MaggieDuke15 The people who love you believe in you.
@MaggieDuke15 You're such a good friend to reach out when you need it.
@MaggieDuke15 Do you ever watch a video or listen to a song you really like on repeat? It can really help your outlook!
@ceh901 It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
@enistoja I love you.
Good night, darling friends. Dream sweetly.
@PandaMymla You are on your way.
@MaggieDuke15 You got this.
@MaggieDuke15 You are the best.
@MaggieDuke15 You are loved.
@MaggieDuke15 People care about you because of who you are, not in spite of it.
@MaggieDuke15 You *do* deserve the happiness that you have in your life.
@MaggieDuke15 Thank you for talking to me! It makes me happy.
@aaogungbesan Hi! I like you!
@aaogungbesan People care about you because of who you are, not in spite of it.
@aaogungbesan It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
